lines.name: The Doctor
lines.flavourText: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

lines.name: House of Mirrors
lines.flavourText: What do you see in the mirror?

lines.name: The Fiend
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Your era is now,|your power unwavered, |soon we will see|who the gods truly favoured.}

lines.name: Hunter's Reward
lines.flavourText: To tame a beast, you first must subdue its heart.

lines.name: The Last One Standing
lines.flavourText: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

lines.name: The Immortal
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{"Greetings! Just because you think I'm greedy doesn't mean I'm not willing to share. You'll just have to kill me first."|-Grandmaster Dy'Ness}

lines.name: The Formless Sea
lines.flavourText: Formless might,|Wild beauty tamed,|The brine of gods,|The seas restrained.

lines.name: Abandoned Wealth
lines.flavourText: When the world burned, the greedy burned with it, while the clever left as paupers.

lines.name: Mawr Blaidd
lines.flavourText: Rigwald believed he'd seized great power, but it was the great power that had seized Rigwald

lines.name: The Dragon's Heart
lines.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

lines.name: Pride Before the Fall
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{As Kaom slew the last of his kin,|something deep inside him broke.|And through the cracks, corruption,|pure and black, spread forth.}

lines.name: The King's Heart
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{500 times Kaom's axe fell, 500 times Kaom's Heart splintered. Finally, all that remained was a terrible, heartless Fury.}

lines.name: The Queen
lines.flavourText: The power of the world, |lies upon your hands.

lines.name: Wealth and Power
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.}

lines.name: The Wolven King's Bite
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.}

lines.name: The Brittle Emperor
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{"When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass."|- Victario, the People's Poet}

lines.name: The Celestial Justicar
lines.flavourText: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

lines.name: The Hunger
lines.flavourText: "How many lives have you consumed?" |"How many times have you blinked?"

lines.name: Chaotic Disposition
lines.flavourText: Life isn't what you make of it, it's already been made for you.

lines.name: The Enlightened
lines.flavourText: Weaving the six,|a serpent stands tall.|Wearing a crown,|the thousand petals call.

lines.name: The Saint's Treasure
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.}

lines.name: The Spark and the Flame
lines.flavourText: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

lines.name: The Artist
lines.flavourText: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: The Wind
lines.flavourText: <size:33>{Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.}

lines.name: The Wolf
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.}

lines.name: Last Hope
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{As their civilisation crumbled, the Vaal looked to their queen. In her, they saw a way out. In them, she saw a burden she was happy to free herself from.}

lines.name: The Thaumaturgist
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{"Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices."|- Shavronne of Umbra}

lines.name: The Standoff
lines.flavourText: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

lines.name: The Valkyrie
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{The villain strikes,|the world is torn.|A war begins, a hero is born,|The nemesis sets the sky alight.|A hero's sacrifice|sets everything right.|- Drake's Epitaph}

lines.name: Heterochromia
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{Black and White, Silver and Gold|Let us see the world Unfold|Red and Blue, Yellow and Green|Let us remake it in colours Unseen}

lines.name: Time-Lost Relic
lines.flavourText: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

lines.name: The Sephirot
lines.flavourText: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

lines.name: The Dapper Prodigy
lines.flavourText: "Many believe murder is a grisly, grim, and grotesque crime. Then there are those who simply make art of it."

lines.name: The Ethereal
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{"Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars."|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge}

lines.name: The Hoarder
lines.flavourText: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

lines.name: Bowyer's Dream
lines.flavourText: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

lines.name: Rebirth
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a normal foe, who will be resurrected and granted new power.
lines.flavourText: An ordinary life, an ordinary death, marked by an extraordinary rebirth.

lines.name: The Offering
lines.flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

lines.name: The Throne
lines.flavourText: A king's movement is unwavering.

lines.name: Left to Fate
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Many strive for greatness,|but it is challenge, unforseen,|that forges heroes.}

lines.name: Emperor of Purity
lines.flavourText: True to his title,|Voll, newly crowned,|had many of the|Eternal Empire's signature|extravagances destroyed.

lines.name: The Void
lines.flavourText: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

lines.name: The Risk
lines.flavourText: "There is no right or wrong choice, no best or worst. There are only choices and their consequences."

lines.name: The Fletcher
lines.flavourText: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

lines.name: The Soul
lines.flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

lines.name: The Vast
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Can you hear the siren's calls,|Just beyond the sea?|A voice which hearts|of men enthralls,|I too am hooked to thee.}

lines.name: The Polymath
lines.flavourText: Genius knows no limits.

lines.name: The Chains that Bind
lines.flavourText: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

lines.name: The Cursed King
lines.flavourText: The First Ones|may be blasphemy,|but they are|powerful blasphemy.

lines.name: Earth Drinker
lines.flavourText: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

lines.name: Lucky Deck
lines.flavourText: When the outcome is the same, does it matter if it is fortune or trickery?

lines.name: The Cartographer
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{It's always easier to find your way if you draw a map of the progress you've made.}

lines.name: The Jester
lines.flavourText: <size:25>{Summoned for the King's desire,|soon applause came from the court.|However insanity was his only sire,|so the King's reign was cut short.}

lines.name: The Warlord
lines.flavourText: To cure the Goddess,|and break the chains of corruption,|you must shatter the world.

lines.name: The Valley of Steel Boxes
lines.flavourText: "The most valuable treasures should be hidden in plain sight." |- Ina, Keeper of Goods

lines.name: Scholar of the Seas
lines.flavourText: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

lines.name: The Wretched
lines.flavourText: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

lines.name: The Dark Mage
lines.flavourText: With staff in hand|and wrath in heart,|your soul and corpse|shall surely part.

lines.name: Lingering Remnants
lines.flavourText: Never dying, yet not living,|Endlessly they wander|beneath the harvest moon.

lines.name: Lucky Connections
lines.flavourText: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

lines.name: The Surveyor
lines.flavourText: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

lines.name: The Trial
lines.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

lines.name: Jack in the Box
lines.flavourText: Turn the crank, |close your eyes, |and pray to the gods |for a pleasant surprise.

lines.name: Lysah's Respite
lines.flavourText: So many memories,|so much pain in|such a small token.|Drown it in blood|so you can forget.

lines.name: Merciless Armament
lines.flavourText: "Through thick and thin,|blood and bone,|a peaceful life|is one I can't condone."|- Tukohama, Father Of War

lines.name: Rats
lines.flavourText: Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.

lines.name: The Body
lines.flavourText: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

lines.name: The Cataclysm
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.}

lines.name: The Demoness
lines.flavourText: Wherever she went, death was sure to follow.

lines.name: The Dragon
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{Scaly beast of the skies,|watching with his golden eyes.|Shadow that blocks out the sun,|it's too late for you to run.}

lines.name: The Gentleman
lines.flavourText: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

lines.name: The Harvester
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Taste not of their|forbidden fruit.|Theirs is a harvest of|the darkest kind,|twisted, rotten and|damned for eternity.}

lines.name: The Lion
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.}

lines.name: The Penitent
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.}

lines.name: The Road to Power
lines.flavourText: A beacon on the horizon; a guiding light, a call for help, or a warning to turn back.

lines.name: The Stormcaller
lines.flavourText: If you beckon the|Lord of Lightning,|do not be surprised|when you are struck.

lines.name: The Survivalist
lines.flavourText: A lucky number |For us all |To help us through |The perils told.

lines.name: The Traitor
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.|Sometimes it happens by force.}

lines.name: The Union
lines.flavourText: On the 21st of Eterni, |two become one, |their light outshines |the setting sun.

lines.name: The Wrath
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{"Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned}

lines.name: Treasure Hunter
lines.flavourText: "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."|- Toggo's Last Words

lines.name: Vinia's Token
lines.flavourText: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

lines.name: The Porcupine
lines.flavourText: The first quill separates the quick learners from the dead.

lines.name: The Forsaken
lines.flavourText: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

lines.name: Atziri's Arsenal
lines.flavourText: In the prison of all sins,|Will you grasp godhood or sorrow?|Only hope lies under the shadows.

lines.name: No Traces
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{There is no mistake so great that it cannot be undone.}

lines.name: The Realm
lines.flavourText: If you wish to rush into strange places, be prepared to face strange things.

lines.name: Audacity
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{A jolt, and it moves. Or smolders.|A current, and it lives. Or dies.|A surge, and it transcends.|Or... not.|Only one way to find out.}

lines.name: Dialla's Subjugation
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{A symbol of beauty and innocence|The gems corrupted her mind|Malachai corrupted her gems|All but a glimmer of|greatness lost in madness}

lines.name: Gemcutter's Promise
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{"I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter}

lines.name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
lines.flavourText: Our Lady Dialla,|as a symbol of our progress,|shines greater than all the gems.

lines.name: The Aesthete
lines.flavourText: "Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."|- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: The Gladiator
lines.flavourText: The thumb turns down|and the crowd roars, |they want death |and the blood is yours.

lines.name: The Lord in Black
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{Thy knee shall bend|in shifting dark,|thy blade shall serve his vigil.|Thy oath shall bind thee|to his mark,|thy flesh shall bear his sigil.}

lines.name: The Mercenary
lines.flavourText: Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

lines.name: The One With All
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{Embrace death to honour the lost,|no fear in life no matter the cost. |With one of all we are, |and all of one we trust, |throughout past, present and future... be just.}

lines.name: The Poet
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{God had forsaken the land |And Victario wept.|Corruption consumed the land |And Victario's tears turned to blood.}

lines.name: The Siren
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{At the beck and call|of The Siren's hand,|winter ravages|the trembling land,|and the weight of ice that binds|will break the strongest of minds.}

lines.name: The Tyrant
lines.flavourText: "Fear controls the masses."|- Laszlo, the Scourge

lines.name: The Inventor
lines.flavourText: Jump right in, |But beware |Of things broken |Or beyond compare.

lines.name: Glimmer of Hope
lines.flavourText: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

lines.name: Emperor's Luck
lines.flavourText: The house always wins.

lines.name: Lost Worlds
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{"There are worlds that lie beyond the edge of my page, the edge of my understanding. Worlds of wonder. Worlds of terror."|Aramil - Cartographer to Emperor Chitus}

lines.name: The Encroaching Darkness
lines.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

lines.name: The Arena Champion
lines.flavourText: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

lines.name: The Battle Born
lines.flavourText: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

lines.name: Boundless Realms
lines.flavourText: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

lines.name: Hope
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

lines.name: The Avenger
lines.flavourText: Justice comes swift |Equal to the crime |Revenge is a gift |Life for a life |Eye for an eye

lines.name: The Explorer
lines.flavourText: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

lines.name: The Fox
lines.flavourText: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."|- Ezomyte Proverb

lines.name: The Scavenger
lines.flavourText: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

lines.name: The Spoiled Prince
lines.flavourText: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

lines.name: The Tower
lines.flavourText: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

lines.name: Three Faces in the Dark
lines.flavourText: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

lines.name: The Pact
lines.flavourText: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

lines.name: Coveted Possession
lines.flavourText: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

lines.name: Birth of the Three
lines.flavourText: A small token of Her affliction.

lines.name: Grave Knowledge
lines.flavourText: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

lines.name: The Pack Leader
lines.flavourText: Become the leader you were born to be.

lines.name: A Mother's Parting Gift
lines.flavourText: Nature was her domain,|Love was her song,|Family was her devotion,|Knowledge was her gift.

lines.name: Anarchy's Price
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Born of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.}

lines.name: Assassin's Favour
lines.flavourText: By the time their eyes meet, |the dark deal has long since been made, |and his fate long since sealed.

lines.name: Blind Venture
lines.flavourText: "It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own."|- Klayver, the Antiquarian

lines.name: Cartographer's Delight
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{A map is similar|to a pair of eyes,|without one you stumble|around, unable to find your way.}

lines.name: Death
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The end of the old,|the beginning of the new.|A unique opportunity for transformation,|for those with the power|to grasp it.}

lines.name: Destined to Crumble
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{"Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us:|Nothing is eternal."|- Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar}

lines.name: Doedre's Madness
lines.flavourText: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

lines.name: Dying Anguish
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.}

lines.name: Her Mask
lines.flavourText: To her beauty you submit,|lest your neck the great Queen slit.

lines.name: Hubris
lines.flavourText: "This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand."|- Jonfé Darontos, Ringmaker

lines.name: Hunter's Resolve
lines.flavourText: Primed, curved and sleek.|Decisive and final.|For malice and righteousness.|There's but one solution.

lines.name: Lantador's Lost Love
lines.flavourText: <smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, |Until the longest of days was done. |Their love grew stronger|with every breath, |Until it was broken apart in death.}

lines.name: Light and Truth
lines.flavourText: Time and change|shall naught avail,|To dim the Light|of Truth's fair grail.

lines.name: Loyalty
lines.flavourText: Bound by fate,|inseparable by choice.

lines.name: Prosperity
lines.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

lines.name: Rain of Chaos
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night |Chaos reigned |Where the shards fell |All was destroyed |-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}

lines.name: Rain Tempter
lines.flavourText: Be like water, friend.

lines.name: Shard of Fate
lines.flavourText: Their whims left unknown,|Their life left for others.

lines.name: The Betrayal
lines.flavourText: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

lines.name: The Calling
lines.flavourText: <size:32>{Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.}

lines.name: The Carrion Crow
lines.flavourText: From death, life. |From life, death. |The wheel turns, |and the corbies wheel overhead.

lines.name: The Catalyst
lines.flavourText: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

lines.name: The Conduit
lines.flavourText: The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.

lines.name: The Doppelganger
lines.flavourText: Upon seeing her face, I am terrified—the moon shows me my own form!

lines.name: The Drunken Aristocrat
lines.flavourText: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

lines.name: The Endurance
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,|flowing through my veins,|flesh like coal, try to crush me,|diamond is what remains.}

lines.name: The Feast
lines.flavourText: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

lines.name: The Flora's Gift
lines.flavourText: Sturdy and strong,|grown from the stream.|The Flora that live here,|A combatant's dream.

lines.name: The Gambler
lines.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

lines.name: The Gemcutter
lines.flavourText: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

lines.name: The Hermit
lines.flavourText: The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.

lines.name: The Incantation
lines.flavourText: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

lines.name: The Inoculated
lines.flavourText: Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.

lines.name: The King's Blade
lines.flavourText: <size:25>{"To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."|- Daresso, the King of Swords}

lines.name: The Lich
lines.flavourText: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

lines.name: The Lover
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{"I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."}

lines.name: The Lunaris Priestess
lines.flavourText: Embrace the Light,|Await the Morrow,|No more Spite,|And no more Sorrow.

lines.name: The Metalsmith's Gift
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.}

lines.name: The Oath
lines.flavourText: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

lines.name: The Rabid Rhoa
lines.flavourText: "Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."|- Maligaro

lines.name: The Scarred Meadow
lines.flavourText: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

lines.name: The Scholar
lines.flavourText: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

lines.name: The Sigil
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{Three men travel|through the gate;|they carry a protective ward.|A faction conspires|against their fate,|but magic unravels the sword.}

lines.name: The Summoner
lines.flavourText: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

lines.name: The Sun
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.}

lines.name: The Surgeon
lines.flavourText: "He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."|- Malachai, on Maligaro

lines.name: The Twins
lines.flavourText: Two sides of a coin;|Heads for a friend,|tails a foe;|Gemini toss up

lines.name: The Visionary
lines.flavourText: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

lines.name: The Warden
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.}

lines.name: The Watcher
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Strange eyes on top of spines |Gaze beyond the veil of time |Deep down below the mines |A dream of crimson and of grime}

lines.name: The Web
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{A weapon, a shelter, a prison.|The web's purpose changes|with the spider's needs.|A lesson we should|take to heart.}

lines.name: The Wolf's Shadow
lines.flavourText: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

lines.name: Thunderous Skies
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.}

lines.name: Tranquillity
lines.flavourText: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

lines.name: Turn the Other Cheek
lines.flavourText: "Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."|- Sekhema Asenath

lines.name: Volatile Power
lines.flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

lines.name: Mitts
lines.flavourText: Those whose hands are their livelihood know the importance of keeping them safe and warm.

lines.name: Call to the First Ones
lines.flavourText: The Ezomyte, desperate for aid, cried out to the gods.

lines.name: The Coming Storm
lines.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

lines.name: The Wolverine
lines.flavourText: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

lines.name: The Garish Power
lines.flavourText: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

lines.name: Might is Right
lines.flavourText: The mind had much to endure before the advent of thaumaturgy.

lines.name: The Opulent
lines.flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

lines.name: Struck by Lightning
lines.flavourText: 'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'|is really just wishful thinking.

lines.name: The Blazing Fire
lines.flavourText: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

lines.name: The Ruthless Ceinture
lines.flavourText: In combat, a warrior must first be resourceful,|and second, decisive.

lines.name: The Eye of the Dragon
lines.flavourText: Some powers are far too great even for the|gods of old.
